actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should submit an action plan to correct abuses in nursing homes.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the President submit to the Congress an actions plan for monitoring investigation of nursing home abuses and for developing better care and cost controls.

titles.title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should submit an action plan to correct abuses in nursing homes.
